Running Man. A South Korean variety show and one of my favourite shows at the moment.
Running Man. A South Korean variety show and one of my favourite shows at the moment.

Episodes 84 and 85. It can be found on KissAsian or Drama Fever.
http://kissasian.com/Drama/Running-Man-Game-Show
https://www.dramafever.com/drama/3970/Running_Man/

Name tag races are the best. They can be pretty intense as well. Or of course the Choi Min Soo episodes, RM fans will all know what I'm talking about :D If you don't want to go from episode 1 and just want to look at one RM's best episodes and my personal favorite go to episode 69, 'Running Man Hunting.'

Another 'Kwangsoo slap' clip. It totally gets me every time:

So happy to see more RM fans out here! Didn't know there would be so much awareness of it.
I've been trying to post RM clips just to get some more attention on it. Its such a great show but ratings are kind of down at the moment :(
So happy to wake up and see that a lot of people are interested in checking this show out! Its one of my favorite shows at the moment and I'm sure you will like it as well if you give it a chance.

WRITING.TITLE: Adorable Baby Upset She Can't Marry Her Dad
Phonebooth - The End of the Earth [Korean Indie Rock]

WRITING.TEXT: After my thread yesterday looking for less popular songs, I've been treated to some absolute masterpieces. This is one that I found myself from a smaller YT channel that was listed. Definitely deserves exposure.
Chanyeol's voice got me immediately hooked in the EXO song. I'm a pretty big fan of EXO, don't know how I haven't come across this yet. It's so smooooth.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23Fn12fUhCk
It's from DJ Friz who worked on the Heize track. Super chill song which might be a boring genre to some but I loved it.
Let me know if you liked it :)
You liked the 'Resist' song? Also, that guy's voice in the Kali song! Wow! Are both the artists in the same group or are they separate? I need to know the guy's name.

We seem to have pretty similar taste in music. If you haven't already, maybe check out some of the music I listed. Definitely check out offonoff - Photograph, I think you'll like it. If you don't like the song, the MV is so beautiful anyway so I'm sure you'll like either the music or the visuals :)
Absolutely loved the Phonebooth song. New fan here! The bit starting at 1:22 gave me chills :o
Jesus. That speed between 1:53 and 2:08 was insane.
I'm not really familiar with BTS' earlier work. This sounds completely different to what I'm used to, but still really good. My boy Namjoon always impresses.
That violin in the background as well :o Is that part of the song?

WRITING.TITLE: In your opinion, what is a song that is really underrated and deserves more attention?
WRITING.TEXT:
Making this thread because one of my favourite songs this year, 'Resist' : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23Fn12fUhCk, has less than 100,000 views. DJ Friz (worked with Heize) has created such a chill track here and its a crime that it doesn't have more attention. The art in it is strangely captivating as well.
Other songs I think need more love include:
Hyukoh - Panda Bear (780,000 views) - The lyrics in this song really resonated with me. Hyukoh's voice is just 3 as well. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hwSF28PG_Fo
Code Kunst - Fire Water (535,000 views) - He previously worked with Oh Hyuk in one of my favourite songs ever (Parachute), this song features another gorgeous voice with G.Soul https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VwKfPS0YMlY
offonoff - Photograph (385,000 views) - Best song for night drives, hands down. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2b1E-zu-QEM
Eric Nam x Timbaland - Body (70,000 views) - A simple song, but still quite catchy. Definitely deserves more than 70,000.

All these people on social media complaining about the new cast members are really pissing me off. Firstly, why are there complaints when they haven't even done a proper ep together yet. Secondly, you can't just comment 7012 everywhere thinking that it proves a point because Gary's gone off. Thirdly, change is needed for RM. They cannot stick with the same concept the whole time. Fourthly, for fucks sake, people need to stfu about Jihyo being the only woman. I like her, but a fresh female presence with a personality that isn't so conservative is needed.These people need to stop crying, get their heads out of their asses and understand that people are actually trying to improve the show and this bitching before the new cast show does not help at all.
If you bothered reading this whole rant, I sincerely applaud you.
That jacket move thing at 3:03 was so clean wtf.
This is seriously my favourite song of the year. Can't believe it took me so long to find out about this group.
Sounds like a pretty sweet idea to me. It's reached that point of the year where FIFA becomes pretty dead. More changes are definitely welcome.
https://www.reddit.com/r/kpop/comments/64lbr9/chinese_girl_group_atf_gets_bombarded_with_hate/
The pure delight on Thor's face was so cute lmao
She's good when it comes to action. When the cast are just talking though, she kind of fades away.
